Key Match Events: Lane Thomas hit a grand slam off Tarik Skubal
Thomas had five RBIs for the Guardians
Skubal lost for the first time since Aug. 2
Post-Match Reflections: Vogt leaned on his MLB-best bullpen
The Guardians are on their way to the ALCS
The Tigers' unimaginable late-season push ended in disappointment
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Guardians won 92 games under first-year manager Stephen Vogt
The Tigers took off and went 31-13 after Aug. 11 to earn a postseason berth
